name: angular-1-x-lazy-loading
description: A demo application for lazy loading of angular 1.x components
author: Maurizio Cescon <maurizio.cescon@gmail.com> (http://www.mauriziocescon.com)

scripts.postinstall: cd lazy && npm install && cd ../base && npm install
scripts.build: cd lazy && npm run build && cd ../base && npm run build
scripts.serve: cd lazy && npm run build && cd ../base && npm run serve
scripts.test: cd lazy && npm run test && cd ../base && npm run test
